name: Learn Alphabet & Number for kids
description: This application is specifically developed for children.This was made by a team of very talented and experienced people who dedicated their lives in teachingThis application can help your children to learn the alphabet and numbers 1 2 3This is also the sound of animals referring to the alphabet. Guess the letter application is also presented in this application.We are sure your children will be happy with this educational application.- Learn to read- Learn the ABC alphabet and Number 123- Learn to Write ABC and Numbers- Learn Animals and animal sounds
